xt:extension.xt:name: ${clipboard} editor variable for oXygen

xt:description.p: This plugin adds support for new editor variable ${clipboard} which can be used to access clipboard content in plain text.
When using ${clipboard} (e.g. in a code template) it will insert the contents from your clipboard in plain text.
The editor variable may be used in all contexts where oXygen allows to use editor variables. However it will not show up in the context menu of the "green arrow button variable chooser"!
